definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: It is a Guangzhou has a long history of 2222 years of cultural city.
sentences.chinese: 广州是一座有2222多年悠久历史的文化名城。

sentences.english: It is one of the best-historical, cultural cities at the state level in China.
sentences.chinese: 它是国家级历史文化名城。

sentences.english: Introduce the famous historical and cultural city in Hei Long jiang ?
sentences.chinese: 请介绍一下黑龙江省的国家及省级历史文化名城？

sentences.english: Protecting and displaying the historical and cultural heritage of the city ?
sentences.chinese: 保护和展示历史文化名城的风貌。

sentences.english: Jong Un was reportedly educated at the International School of Berne, which he attended under a pseudonym
sentences.chinese: 据报道，金正云在伯尔尼的国际学校以化名就读。

sentences.english: Xi’an, as a famous city with profound historical and cultural significance in China, enjoys a history that can be dated back to several thousand years ago.
sentences.chinese: 西安作为中国的历史文化名城拥有几千年的历史。

sentences.english: Above all, since Ming Dynasty, it has become the symbol of Guilin history and culture, an important part in Guilin history.
sentences.chinese: 王城史是桂林历史文化名城史的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The Dayan Old Town is a World Historical and Cultural City.
sentences.chinese: 丽江大研古城是世界历史文化名城。

sentences.english: He Eileen Chang said he would not emergency, but to be a pseudonym to hide for some time.
sentences.chinese: 张爱玲他表示，他不紧急，但要化名隐藏一段时间。

sentences.english: Fushan is an historical and cultural celebrity who was given birth to by Jinyang culture.
sentences.chinese: 傅山是晋阳文化孕育出的历史文化名人。

sentences.english: "Taylor" is the pseudonym she uses with men she meets online.
sentences.chinese: “泰勒”是这名女生在网上使用的化名。

sentences.english: In 2001 Shanhaiguan Pass district won the title of national historical and cultural town.
sentences.chinese: 2001年，山海关区又荣膺国家历史文化名城称号。

sentences.english: Don found checkbooks under four different aliases.There were letters in Mr.
sentences.chinese: 唐找到本用了四个不同化名的支票簿。

sentences.english: He held his solo exhibition in Toronto, 2004.
sentences.chinese: 2004年在多伦路文化名人街举办个人画展。

sentences.english: He travels the world using a number of names and his adventures are the talk of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他以多个化名环游世界，他的冒险也在巴黎传颂一时。

sentences.english: It is located 5 minutes from the main plaza of the historic city centre -Macau's world heritage site.
sentences.chinese: 澳门的历史文化名城中心亦是在5分钟步行距离之内。
